txt.en: 'Among the Wardens of Annúminas, we traditionally signify the authority of our leadership via the Warden's Sceptre. Alas, tradition also dictates the inclusion of a rather rare ore in its construction.\n\n'If you can forge for us such a sceptre, the Wardens would be greatly obliged to you.'
'Aye, that is a Warden's Sceptre, and elegantly forged as well! My thanks to you and your kin, good [placeholder].'
'Remember, should you come across the ore required, we would be greatly appreciative by your crafting of a Warden's Sceptre for our use.'
The Wardens of Annúminas signify their leadership with a special token, the Warden's Sceptre.
Present your Warden's Sceptre to Cannasgam at Tinnudir
Cannasgam is at Tinnudir in Evendim.\n\nCannasgam has asked you to forge a Warden's Sceptre and bring it to her.
